context: Airbnb, Inc. is a online marketplace for short-term lodging and experiences focused on vacation rentals, unique stays, and travel experiences. Mature marketplace with focus on quality and trust. Icons and unique experiences driving differentiation.

competitors.name: Booking Holdings
competitors.notes: Booking.com with massive global accommodation inventory

competitors.name: Expedia Group
competitors.notes: Vrbo and Hotels.com competing across accommodations

competitors.name: Hotel Chains
competitors.notes: Marriott, Hilton expanding alternative accommodation offerings

competitors.name: Vacasa
competitors.notes: Vacation rental management with large US inventory

competitors.name: Google Travel
competitors.notes: Direct booking and aggregation threatening OTAs
